title: Study finds ChatGPT boosts worker productivity for some writing tasks
summary: A study from MIT researchers has found that generative AI technology, specifically the chatbot ChatGPT, can increase productivity for workers in tasks such as writing cover letters and emails. The study showed that access to ChatGPT reduced task completion time by 40% and improved output quality by 18%. While the study's tasks were not exact replicas of real work, participants found them similar to their actual job responsibilities. The researchers believe that generative AI will have a significant impact on white-collar work but acknowledge that it is still too early to determine the overall effects on society. The study also highlighted the need for further research to understand the broader economic and political implications of generative AI.
